CustomField.description: Used in a report to group closed Activities by Month.
CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(ActivityDate), 1, "1. January", 2, "2. February", 3, "3. March", 4, "4. April", 5, "5. May", 6, "6. June", 7, "7. July", 8, "8. August", 9, "9. September", 10, "10. October", 11, "11. November", 12, "12. December", "None")
CustomField.label: Month
